bibl.title: Greeks and Egyptians: Ethnicity, Status, and Culture.
bibl.note: Reviews selected areas of Greek-Egyptian interaction as they are reflected in recent scholarship and sketches the directions in which these inquiries seem to be leading.

bibl.title: Cleopatra's Egypt. Age of the Ptolemies

bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., Greeks and Egyptians: Ethnicity, Status, and Culture.
Cleopatra's Egypt. Age of the Ptolemies (Brooklyn, 1988) pp. 21-27.
Reviews selected areas of Greek-Egyptian interaction as they are reflected in recent scholarship and sketches the directions in which these inquiries seem to be leading.
